choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss], 
I hope this email finds you in good health and spirits. I wanted to take a moment to inform you that after much thought and consideration, I have decided to leave the company. This decision was not easy for me but it is what I believe is best for my personal growth and career development at this time. 

I want to thank you for all the opportunities and experiences that you provided me during my tenure with the company. It has been a pleasure working alongside such talented individuals, and I have learned so much from each of them. 

Please be assured that I am leaving on good terms and will do everything in my power to ensure a smooth transition for my team members and colleagues. I hope that our relationship continues even after this change and that we may continue to collaborate and support one another in the future.

Again, thank you for your understanding and support during my time with the company. It has been an honor to work alongside such a great group of individuals and I am grateful for all the memories and experiences that have come from it. 

Best regards, [Your Name]
